alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Lucas; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 3:26AM EDT until July 29 at 4:45AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ottawa County in northwestern Ohio... Northwestern Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... Sandusky County in northwestern Ohio... Wood County in northwestern Ohio... Northern Hancock County in northwestern Ohio... Lucas County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 445 AM EDT. * At 325 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Archbold to near Defiance, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Toledo, Findlay, Bowling Green, Tiffin, Fremont, Fostoria, Swanton, Perrysburg, Oregon, Sylvania, Clyde, Rossford, Waterville, Northwood, Whitehouse, North Baltimore, Oak Harbor, Gibsonburg, Genoa and Woodville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Hancock; Lucas; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca; Wood
